description: Jumpstart your career with our free JOBSTART package, featuring essential resources for your job search
featured_info: A Free ATS Resume Template to ensure your resume gets noticed by employers.
A Job Hunting Tracker to keep you organized and on top of your applications.
A Salary Negotiation Guide to help you secure the compensation you deserve.
Tips on how to build an Elevator Pitch that makes a lasting impression.
title: Jumpstart plan

description: Take control of your career materials with all the tools and resources you need to succeed.
featured_info: Access to our complete set of tutorials and guides to create your CV, LinkedIn profile, and prepare for interviews.
Step-by-step video tutorials for creating a standout resume, optimizing your LinkedIn, and acing your interviews.
No advisory sessions are included, but you can always purchase additional consultation sessions if you need expert guidance.
title: Basic plan

description: We create everything for you, no stress involved! Get your CV and LinkedIn ready for success.
featured_info: We create your CV and LinkedIn profile for you based on your experience and career goals.
No meetings required, but an optional session is available to clarify any doubts you may have.
title: Standard plan

description: Everything you need to succeed, including interviews and personalized coaching!
featured_info: All the benefits of the Standard Plan, including your CV and LinkedIn created by experts.
Interview Preparation: We’ll help you prepare for interviews with tailored questions and tips.
Two coaching sessions with an experienced advisor, who will work with you on interview techniques and career advice.
Additional language support for your resume and LinkedIn.
title: Premium plan
